column2: Does the law mandate paid or unpaid maternity leave?
column3: Does the law mandate paid or unpaid paternity leave?
column4: Does the law mandate equal remuneration for men and women for work of equal value?
column5: Are there laws mandating non-discrimination based on gender in hiring?
column6: Is it illegal for an employer to ask about family status during a job interview?
column7: Are there laws penalizing or preventing the dismissal of pregnant women?
column8: Are employers required to provide break time for nursing mothers?
